faq.question: Can I switch plans later?
faq.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and bank transfers for enterprise customers.

faq.question: Is there a free trial?
faq.answer: Yes! The Professional plan includes a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required.

faq.question: What happens if I exceed my device limit?
faq.answer: We'll notify you when you're approaching your limit. You can upgrade your plan or we'll help you optimize your device usage.

faq.question: Do you offer discounts for annual billing?
faq.answer: Yes! Save 20% when you choose annual billing on Professional and Enterprise plans.

story.heading: Our Story
paragraphs: Founded in 2020, TecNoBand emerged from a simple observation: managing IoT devices at scale was becoming increasingly complex and time-consuming. Our founders, experienced IoT engineers and data scientists, saw an opportunity to leverage artificial intelligence to automate and optimize device management.

Today, we serve over 500 enterprise clients worldwide, managing more than 10 million connected devices across industries including manufacturing, healthcare, smart cities, and logistics. Our platform has evolved to become the industry standard for intelligent IoT management.
